items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect, sexy, comfy and quality
items.body: Perfect fit. Super flattering. Exactly like the picture. The material is soft and comfortable. It has lots of stretch. Will be perfect for my Vegas concert. Read more
items.author: Joe and Emma

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect dress and not too revealing
items.body: This dress is a beauty. The fit is amazing. The dress is super flattering without revealing too much but super sexy with a twist of elegance. I thought it would look bad on me and I thought it’s too revealing…NOT it’s my new #1 dress to go to for nice occasions. I received many compliments and men and women ask me where I got my dress from and they couldn’t believe it was on Amazon. Thank u to the seller for this amazing dress. Please get more colors in this dress cause it’s a hit. Please try this dress. It’s true to fit and has some stretch to it. Keep them coming Read more
items.author: Kaylie Ann Tudor

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super sexy dress that elevates any occasion.
items.body: I absolutely love this dress. Recently got it for an event and it looked amazing! Style is perfect, light weight, great fit, and yes, see through. Make sure you wear skin colored undergarments, either way it's a hot dress. Read more
items.author: Ashley E

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Poor conditions, looked used
items.body: Upon receiving the dress, we found that it had ripped and unstitched sections Read more
items.author: Carolina

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress
items.body: This dress was a good buy, it had stretch to it. I ordered a medium for a tighter fit. I’m 5ft 167 pounds. It’s not taller girl friendly. The lace is a thick material. The sheer is good as well. This dress will not disappoint. The only con was the black piece around my waist keep rising up as I walked. Read more
items.author: Francia

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant lace dress
items.body: Sexy elegant lace dress. Will not disappoint. Dress it up with a nice shawl or bolero ir elevates the look. Read more
items.author: Tanisha

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sexy and flattering
items.body: I love this dress so much! It’s Lacey and sexy, and exactly what I was looking for, something that was sexy, but also classy. I wore this to a masquerade event and it was perfect, this would be the perfect dress for a masquerade event or some sort of fun event. I love that part of it is see-through, but I love even more that there is a tie around the waist area so that it snatches in your stomach and it looks very flattering. Read more
items.author: Amy Dalli

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Expensive look but detail downfalls
items.body: The media could not be loaded. Very cute, I really love the design & it looks expensive. For the white you definitely need white undergarments, they will look part of the dress. My cons are: - it is not the length depicted in the image. I’m 5’5 & it just crossed my ankles - the drape doesn’t allow for much adjustments, the gold piece can move from side to center but doesn’t adjust tightness Read more
items.author: melanie chung

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, White, Black, Black B. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
